description: Moria refugee camp burned down, leaving more than 12,000 people without shelter or sanitation.
title: Greece to build permanent migrant centre to replace Moria
title_page: Greece to build permanent migrant centre to replace Moria - BBC News
maintext: "The second opportunity out of this tragedy is to create on Lesbos a new permanent reception and identification centre that will not carry the negative aspects and problems of Moria - which is identified, and rightly so, with the mismanagement of the refugee issue."
